name: Low Volatility Regime
description: Stable market with minimal volatility clustering. Tests GARCH parameter estimation and regime classification in low volatility environment.

input.comment: Generated by generateGARCH_LowVolatility() - 200 returns with σ ≈ 0.005

forecastVolatility.comment: 5-step ahead forecast should stay near current low level

notes: Low volatility regime. GARCH model should estimate parameters with moderate persistence (α+β ~0.85-0.90). Volatility classification should be LOW based on z-score.
